channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Greeklish-permalink

item.title: CVE-2023-2495|2024-08-02T06:26:09.230Z -- unknown -- greeklish-permalink
item.description: The Greeklish-permalink WordPress plugin through 3.3 does not implement correct authorization or nonce checks in the cyrtrans_ajax_old AJAX action, allowing unauthenticated and low-privilege users to trigger the plugin's functionality to change Post slugs either directly or through CSRF.
